content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at this PDF, I can see two ID cards from Colombia. It contains: - Individual biographical data (birth date, place of birth) - Physical characteristics (height, blood type, gender) - Individual photo, signature, fingerprint - Personal ID number with individual name - Security elements (official format, barcode) 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This clearly fits CECRL: - Individual identification terminology: "IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL", "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA" - Comprehensive personal details confirm official identification document status - Precise government-issued format validates authenticity 6. **CONFIDENCE VALIDATION** Extremely high confidence in document classification and content verification.
